headline: Steris (STE) Reports Q3 Earnings: What Key Metrics Have to Say
summary: Although the revenue and EPS for Steris (STE) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended December 2024, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

headline: Steris (STE) Matches Q3 Earnings Estimates
summary: Steris (STE) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 0% and 0.67%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: STERIS (NYSE:STE) Reports Sales Below Analyst Estimates In Q4 Earnings
summary: Medical equipment and services company Steris (NYSE:STE). fell short of the market’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2024, but sales rose 5.6% year on year to $1.37 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.32 per share was in line with analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: STERIS (NYSE:STE) Reports Sales Below Analyst Estimates In Q4 Earnings
raw.summary: Medical equipment and services company Steris (NYSE:STE). fell short of the market’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2024, but sales rose 5.6% year on year to $1.37 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.32 per share was in line with analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Steris: Fiscal Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results met Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of three analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was also for earnings of $2.32 per share. The medical products maker posted revenue of $1.37 billion in the period, falling short of Street forecasts.

raw.headline: Steris: Fiscal Q3 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The results met Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of three analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was also for earnings of $2.32 per share. The medical products maker posted revenue of $1.37 billion in the period, falling short of Street forecasts.

headline: STERIS Announces Financial Results for Fiscal 2025 Third Quarter
summary: Total revenue from continuing operations increased 6%; constant currency organic revenue grew 6% As reported diluted EPS from continuing operations increased to $1.75; adjusted EPS increased to $2.32Fiscal 2025 outlook updated DUBLIN, IRELAND, Feb. 05, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- STERIS plc (NYSE: STE) (“STERIS” or the “Company”) today announced financial results for its fiscal 2025 third quarter ended December 31, 2024.
